item.title: Nonny add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "You can fix anything but a blank page." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power. If you realize that you have enough, you are truly rich." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Men are born soft and supple; dead they are stiff and hard. Plants are born tender and pliant; dead, they are brittle and dry. Thus whoever is stiff and inflexible is a disciple of death. Whoever is soft and yielding is a disciple of life. The hard and stiff will be broken. The soft and supple will prevail." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Nonny add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Do not meddle in the affairs of wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Nonny add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Fantasy is escapist, and that is its glory. If a soldier is imprisioned by the enemy, don't we consider it his duty to escape?. . .If we value the freedom of mind and soul, if we're partisans of liberty, then it's our plain duty to escape, and to take as many people with us as we can!" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Nonny add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Cheris Kramarae
item.description: "Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings." -- Cheris Kramarae

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Dolly Parton
item.description: "If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one." -- Dolly Parton

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "You didn't kill him. He would have killed you, but you didn't kill him." "So? He was stupid. If I killed everyone who was stupid, I wouldn't have time to sleep." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "If you've a story, make sure it's a whole one, with details close to hand. It's the difference between a good lie and getting caught." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Anne Bishop
item.description: "Everything has a price." -- Anne Bishop

item.title: Nonny add a quote by marquis de sade
item.description: "Either kill me or take me as I am, because I'll be damned if I ever change." -- marquis de sade

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Marion Zimmer Bradley
item.description: "If you own a machine, you are in turn owned by it, and spend your time serving it..." -- Marion Zimmer Bradley

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Does the walker choose the path, or the path the walker?" -- Garth Nix

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Richard Adams
item.description: "My heart has joined the Thousand, for my friend stopped running today." -- Richard Adams

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "Great heroes need great sorrows and burdens, or half their greatness goes unnoticed. It is all part of the fairy tale." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Nonny add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description:
"Then what is magic for?" Prince Lír demanded wildly. "What use is wizardry if it cannot save a unicorn?" He gripped the magician's shoulder hard, to keep from falling.
Schmedrick did not turn his head. With a touch of sad mockery in his voice, he said, "That's what heroes are for." -- Peter S. Beagle
